channel.title: Posts on Rocky Mountain Regional RNA Meetings
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Rocky Mountain Regional RNA Meetings

item.title: CU RNA Club (Feb 6)
item.description: CU RNA Club will be held on February 6 2018 on the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.

item.title: Save the Date!
item.description: The Colorado RNA community is hosting the inaugural Rocky Mountain RNA Meeting on October 10-12 2019. The meeting will be held on the Anschutz Medical Campus.
